        public void setKeptDice(int die,
                        boolean kept)
        sets the die to kept or not
        Parameters:
        die - the index of the die to set
        kept - true or false for whether the die is set to kept or not kept

      • rollHand

        public java.util.ArrayList<Dice> rollHand()
        calls the turn class to roll the hand, and figures out if there are rolls left
        Returns:
        hand the hand, after a roll if there are rolls left, or returns the same hand if no rolls are left

      • sortHand

        public java.util.ArrayList<Dice> sortHand()
        calls the turn class to sort the hand
        Returns:
        hand the sorted hand of dice

      • getPossibleScores

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> getPossibleScores()
        calls the turn class to get the arraylist of possible scores, and gives them to the window class
        Returns:
        ususedScoresList the arraylist of the unused scores
